md:
giải nghĩa từ "elevating" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Elevating** (verb)

* Meaning: to lift or raise something or someone up; to improve or increase something
* Vietnamese: nâng cao, tăng lên

Example sentence: The new policy is elevating the standard of living for many people in the country.

* Related words: lift, raise, increase, improve
* Antonyms: lowering, reducing, decreasing

Note: Elevating can also mean to make something more interesting or exciting, as in "The fireworks display was elevating the mood of the party."

Elevating (verb)

  • Meaning: to lift or raise something or someone up; to improve or increase something
  • Vietnamese: nâng cao, tăng lên

Example sentence: The new policy is elevating the standard of living for many people in the country.

  • Related words: lift, raise, increase, improve
  • Antonyms: lowering, reducing, decreasing

Note: Elevating can also mean to make something more interesting or exciting, as in "The fireworks display was elevating the mood of the party."
